short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to read a selected text area in a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows to read a selected text area in a website. 
After selecting a text, click on the extension icon and the selected text will be transformed into speech. Multiple languages are supported including English language, french language and Spanish.
